a11rallypong

Class HighScoresGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • a11rallypong.HighScoresGUI

  • public class HighScoresGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The HighScoresGUI class creates a GUI that displays the top ten high scores achieved in the game. It is accessed via the main menu and has a button to bring the user back to the main menu.
    Author:
    Erich

      Create the application.

      static java.awt.Rectangle getScreenTotalArea(java.awt.Window windowOrNull)
      The getScreenTotalArea method finds the size of the users screen so that the game can be fullscreen on any screen size and the play area will adapt to this size.

      • getAScore

        public java.lang.String getAScore(java.util.ArrayList<score> sa,
                                  int Location)
        The getAScore method pulls a score object out of the list of scores according to the location specified
        Parameters:
        sa - A given ArrayList of scores to pull an object from.
        Location - The position of the desired score in the array.
        Returns:
        the record from the score object that was selected.

      • getScreenTotalArea

        public static java.awt.Rectangle getScreenTotalArea(java.awt.Window windowOrNull)
        The getScreenTotalArea method finds the size of the users screen so that the game can be fullscreen on any screen size and the play area will adapt to this size.
        Parameters:
        windowOrNull - the window the method should find the size of.
        Returns:
        a Rectangle representing the dimesions of the screen.
